channel.title: [PI]Making my own spellbook
channel.description:
So what I'm trying to do is create my own spellbook with customs sprites and stuff. The only problem is that I am completely unaware of where i would make the sprite a button. So far I have created the actual interface and i stole the ancient home tele and shoved it into it. All i need to do is make a clickable sprite in the interface. Then i could probably do the rest. So yea...any suggestions, tips would be great.
The only reason i was able to do this is because the home tele already has an id [IMG]http://i280.photobucket.com/albums/kk184/50percentelf/Untitled.png[/img]

item.title: [PI]Making my own spellbook
item.dc:creator: @Wet_Dreamss Wet Dreamss
item.description:
@Wet_Dreamss wrote:

[quote=“50percentelf, post:1, topic:422456”]So what I’m trying to do is create my own spellbook with customs sprites and stuff. The only problem is that I am completely unaware of where i would make the sprite a button. So far I have created the actual interface and i stole the ancient home tele and shoved it into it. All i need to do is make a clickable sprite in the interface. Then i could probably do the rest. So yea…any suggestions, tips would be great.

The only reason i was able to do this is because the home tele already has a an id
[/quote]

Well pretty much what you would do is add the sprites\interfaces\Lunar and Magic

Then you would have to make a actionButtonID for this (i have no idea where as i have never done it) Then a case number in ClickingButtons.java so when they click it, it actually teles them. Anyways good luck to u.

Read full topic
